listMiners

  • listMiners(fromId?: string, limit?: number): Promise<Array<Miner>>
    • Defined in modules/explorer.ts:461

    Get list of miners objects.

    deprecated

    This method will be removed in next release

    Parameters

    • Default value fromId: string = "0.0.0"

      Miner id to start from, last part of id -> X from '1.4.X'. Default '0.0.0' -> List from start

    • Default value limit: number = 100

      Limit result list. Default 100(Max)

    Returns Promise<Array<Miner>>
